name: Guatemala Beans
description: Lime-like acidity is paired with a rich velvety body and strawberry preserve notes, cooling sweet like honey.

name: Costa Rica Beans
description: Grown on a high altitude farm in the shade of many tropical and citrus trees, this honey processed coffee has sweet citrus notes in the beginning with balanced acidity and a clean finish.

name: Sumatra Beans
description: Our darkest roast, this coffee has a full body with robust and deep dark chocolate tasting notes.  A smooth flavor profile for a coffee drinker who prefers a rich and bold coffee.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Designed for pour overs, this kettle includes variable temperature control and an ergonomic design

name: Hario Grinder
description: This hand grinder is a great bang for your buck

name: Vacuum Contianer
description: Take the hassle (and oxygen) out of storing coffee

name: ilters
description: Filters designed to fit in pour over brewer.

name: Pour Over Brewer
description: One of the most simple and best brewers out there.
